## Welcome

In the year of 2020, we are all being quarantined or asked to stay home due to the pandemic **COVID-19** that is happening around the world! In order to stay sane and *productive* I have started a project with the following goals in mind:

* Learn to process scRNAseq data which could help in generating a relevant hypothesis for my PhD 
* Become more proficient in R
* Put it all on a webpage to document my progress and perhaps serve as a document to help others get started

In an attempt to practice using Markdown thanks to <https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/> and <https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet#images>, here is a random slew of things:
